page.title: 02WIND BREAKS
page.content:
WIND BREAKS ___________
This small amount of trees are called Wind Breaks. These grown trees are to stop the wind from the sea from ruining the farmer's crops. The trees breaks down the wind when blown across the land. Rows of trees are scattered all over the country. The rows of trees are at different angles on the map as it depends on which way the wind is blowing. When the wind is high, this is a bad time for the crops, that's why they were put there by the people who stayed there years ago. These wind breaks take up a lot of farmland, but farmers still have a lot of famland to plant crops.
